Fresh fruits which flavor the tapioca drink! Awesome! But a tad sweet - if you go, definitely ask them to cut down on the sugar/fruit level. (I'm thinking like half).  Dont get me wrong,  if youre a kid or a diabetic with a death wish, get the drink as is.But asides that,  can't complain, and it was refreshing to see a boba tea shop right in the middle of barcelona.
